title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 373.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 373.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the following terms shall have the
definitions provided below, unless a different meaning is clearly required by
the context: (a) Beneficiary means an
individual receiving survivor benefits from the system. (b) Code means the Federal Internal Revenue

Code of 1986, as amended. (c) Employer means the State and participating employers in the system. (d) Member means a retired individual
receiving retirement benefits from the system. (e) Participant means an employee who is
eligible to receive benefits under the plan provided by this Part. (f) Plan means the plan established by this
act for the payment of retirement benefits as permitted under code section
415(m). (g) Plan year means the
limitation year of the system under code section 415. (h) System means the New York State and Local

Police and Fire Retirement System. (i) Trustee means the Comptroller of the

State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
373.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
